hibernate-mapping.query: select p, o from Procedure p join p.Order o join fetch p.Order join fetch p.ProcedureCheckIn join fetch o.Visit where o.Patient = ? and p.Status not in ('GH')
select o from Order o join fetch o.Visit where o.Patient = ?
select r from Report r join r.Procedures rp join rp.Order o join fetch r.Procedures where o.Patient = ? and r.Status not in ('X')
select r from Report r join r.Procedures rp join rp.Order o join fetch r.Procedures where o = ? and r.Status not in ('X')
